name: OVERCOMPUTED
description:
This is a game that was made for a Ljubljana Game Jam 2020 and was later polished to a point you see here. The theme for the game jam was repair, so we made the game about repairing broken devices,  while being in a race against time.

Credits:

Laserfin99 (Texture and material artist - Dominik Bratina)

Titan (Programmer - Tian Jagodic)

Tomaž Štrus (Support)

Matic Rode (Hard surface modeler)

Aquagon (sound desing - Maja Salomon)

ANormalPerson (Programmer - Juš Dolžan)

TajTheGuy (3D charcter artist/animator)

The game was later developed by:

Laserfin99 (Texture and material artist - Dominik Bratina)

ANormalPerson (Programmer - Juš Dolžan)

TajTheGuy (3D charcter artist/animator)  https://www.artstation.com/tajtheguy
